name: DTaPVaccine
title: DTaP Vaccine
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent diphtheria, tetanus, and whooping cough (pertussis) (DTaP) vaccines.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Immunization, Administered.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with diphtheria, tetanus, and whooping cough (pertussis) (DTaP) vaccine codes. This is a grouping of CVX codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
